duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate business by identifying and pursuing sales opportunities within the business-to-business (B2B) market.
Maintain a proactive approach to sales, actively seeking out new prospects and engaging in lead generation activities.
Build and nurture a strong pipeline of potential clients, conducting research to understand their needs and presenting compelling solutions.
Leverage effective sales techniques to persuade and negotiate with potential clients, driving closure of opportunities and achieving sales targets.
Maintain ongoing relationships with existing clients, understanding their evolving needs, and providing high-quality service and support.
Use a customer relationship management (CRM) platform to track and manage client interactions, ensuring a structured and efficient sales process.
Collaborate with the sales team and management to develop and implement innovative sales strategies and tactics.
Regularly report on sales activities, outcomes, and market insights, using data-driven insights to refine sales approaches and strategies.
Participate in industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to expand professional networks and generate sales leads.
Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities, identifying potential areas for business growth and development.
